column1: Smoque BBQ////Parking around here is pretty hard to find
column2: and you might end up waiting a bit to be able to sit down
column3: but the food makes it all worth it. My personal favorites are the baby back ribs
column6: but honestly everything they serve here is delicious. If you're not into sitting and eating somewhere crowded and noisy
column8: if you're not a fan of cole slaw but want to order a combo that comes with cole slaw as Â side
